text:
Name: Travis Liu
Headline: Software Engineer in Test — RBC
Location: Mississauga, Ontario, Canada (Hybrid)

About: Software Engineer in Test at RBC focused on reliable UI/API automation and quality gates for cloud-native services. I build and maintain Selenium test suites, API testing frameworks, and CI/CD checks for apps running on OpenShift/Kubernetes, with observability via ELK and Dynatrace. Previously at Seneca, I contributed to the International Agents Portal and Academic Pathways projects and supported instructors and students as a Lab Assistant.

Experience:
• Software Engineer in Test — RBC (Permanent Full-time), Oct 2024–Present, Canada (Hybrid)
  Work: Selenium E2E/UI, API testing, test methodologies, CI/CD gating, observability with ELK/Dynatrace; collaborate with DevOps/product teams.
• Software Developer — Seneca Polytechnic (Contract Full-time), May 2023–May 2024, North York (Hybrid)
  Work: 12-person team; International Agents Portal & Academic Pathways; React/Next.js, REST APIs, DB work, report development; deployments with a DevOps engineer.
• Student Lab Assistant — Seneca Polytechnic, Jan 2023–May 2023
  Work: Supported 3 instructors and ~60 students; troubleshooting, explaining technical concepts, improving documentation.
• Member, Board of Directors — Seneca Student Federation (Contract Part-time), May 2023–May 2024, North York (Hybrid)
  Work: Team leadership and management.

Education:
Seneca Polytechnic — Associate’s Degree, Computer Programming & Analysis (Jan 2022–Aug 2024), GPA 3.9
Relevant: Cloud Computing, Data Structures, Software Testing.

Skills: Selenium; Test Automation; Test Engineering; Software Testing; API Testing; Web Testing; CI/CD; Kubernetes; OpenShift; Docker; Elastic Stack (ELK); Dynatrace; REST APIs; Python; JavaScript/TypeScript; React.js; Next.js; MongoDB; SQL/Databases; Database Testing; OAuth; Jest; GitHub; .NET; C++; Troubleshooting; DevOps; Project Management.
